headline: Jim Cramer Discusses Trump Interest Rate Cap & Mastercard (MA)
summary: We recently published 9 Stocks Jim Cramer Talked About. Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer talked about. Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA)’s shares are down by 2.8% year-to-date. The shares, like those of peer companies Visa and American Express, have struggled after President Trump suggested capping credit card interest rates at 10%. […]

headline: Why Mastercard's API-First Strategy Is Becoming a Growth Multiplier
summary: MA's API-first push is turning it into a payments infrastructure, embedding tokenization, fraud and open banking to drive stickier, higher-margin growth.

headline: Crypto Card Market Explodes 15x as Stablecoin Spending Soars 106% Annually: Report
summary: The crypto payments landscape has undergone a dramatic transformation, with crypto card volumes surging from roughly $100 million monthly in early 2023 to over $1.5 billion by late 2025, representing a 106% compound annual growth rate that now rivals peer-to-peer stablecoin transfers, according to a comprehensive report from Artemis Analytics.Source: ...

headline: UK court backs regulator’s power to cap cross‑border card fees
summary: The regulator has previously said it is concerned that Mastercard and Visa increased cross‑border interchange fees to an “unduly high level”.
